TITLE: Sen. Lindsey Graham says he was stating the obvious with Trump riots claim
SUMMARY: U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham has defended saying there would be "riots in the streets" if Trump was prosecuted for mishandling classified information.

TITLE: Trump pick for Michigan secretary of state race Kristina Karamo threatened to kill her family, court records claim
SUMMARY: Kristina Karamo is running to become Michigan's top election official.  Donald Trump, who endorsed her, has falsely alleged ballot fraud in that state.

TITLE: John Podesta to join Biden's climate team as top advisor Gina McCarthy departs
SUMMARY: John Podesta is joining President Joe Biden's team as a senior advisor overseeing the implementation of $370 billion in clean energy projects.

TITLE: Trump ex-Attorney General Bill Barr defends FBI search of Mar-a-Lago
SUMMARY: Barr publicly split with Trump after Biden won the 2020 election by undermining Trump's false claims that the race was rigged through widespread fraud.

TITLE: Four dozen empty folders marked 'CLASSIFIED' found in Trump Mar-a-Lago raid, DOJ reveals
SUMMARY: The Department of Justice is investigating possible crimes related to the removal of  government documents from the White House when Trump left office.

TITLE: Biden warns Trump's extreme MAGA Republicans are 'clear and present danger' to U.S. democracy
SUMMARY: "Trump and MAGA Republicans pose a clear and present danger to our democracy," Biden said, speaking in front of Independence Hall in Philadelphia.

TITLE: Lukoil Chairman Ravil Maganov is the 8th Russian energy executive to die suddenly this year
SUMMARY: Since January, seven other Russian energy executives have died under unusual circumstances, according to reports by Russian and international news agencies.

TITLE: Trump raid judge to unseal detailed inventory of what FBI seized at Mar-a-Lago, delays special master ruling
SUMMARY: The Department of Justice is conducting a criminal probe into the transfer of White House records to Mar-a-Lago when former President Donald Trump left office.

TITLE: Job growth, investments in manufacturing sector tied to White House economic plan, Biden says
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden credits his economic plan for technology manufacturers' new investments, job growth.

TITLE: Ginni Thomas, wife of Supreme Court justice, urged lawmakers to overturn Trump election loss in Wisconsin, report says
SUMMARY: The wife of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas also urged the Trump White House chief of staff to try to overturn President Joe Biden's election win.

TITLE: Judge denies Sen. Lindsey Graham bid to quash subpoena in Trump Georgia election probe, but puts limit on questions
SUMMARY: Fulton County, Georgia, District Attorney Fani Willis is investigating possible 2020 election interference by former President Donald Trump and his allies.

TITLE: Trump and accounting firm agree to give financial records to House Oversight Committee in deal to end court battle
SUMMARY: The House Oversight Committee for more than three years has sought financial records of former President Donald Trump as part of an investigation.

TITLE: U.S. health officials brace for another fall Covid surge, but with fewer deaths
SUMMARY: Health officials say the U.S. is in a much stronger position due to new boosters, antiviral treatments, therapeutics and immunity from previous infections.

TITLE: Trump lawyers again push for special master to review documents in FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago
SUMMARY: Lawyers for ex-President Donald Trump asked a federal judge to appoint a "special master" to review documents seized from Mar-a-Lago by the FBI.

TITLE: Trump lawyer John Eastman takes Fifth before Georgia grand jury in election-interference probe
SUMMARY: Efforts by allies of Donald Trump to undo his election loss to President Joe Biden are the focus of a criminal probe in Georgia.

TITLE: Democratic Rep. Charlie Crist resigns from Congress as he takes on GOP Gov. Ron DeSantis in Florida
SUMMARY: Crist's move came as DeSantis and former President Donald Trump are both rumored to be considering a run for the White House in the next election cycle.

TITLE: DOJ opposes special master for documents seized from Trump, says more than 100 classified records found at Mar-a-Lago
SUMMARY: Donald Trump wants a special master to examine documents seized from Mar-a-Lago in an FBI raid, which the DOJ says found scores of classified documents.

TITLE: DOJ says review of seized Trump documents is already done, suggests request for watchdog came too late
SUMMARY: The "limited set" of potentially privileged materials was identified by a law enforcement team separate from those investigating Trump, the DOJ said.

TITLE: GOP leaders warn Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters to raise more money — or risk losing to Democrat Mark Kelly
SUMMARY: Republican leaders and megadonors have privately called on Blake Masters to start improving his fundraising operation or risk losing to Democrat Mark Kelly.

TITLE: Dr. Oz aims to defend the energy industry, which has boosted his nonprofit and Pennsylvania Senate campaign
SUMMARY: Dr. Mehmet Oz is siding with the energy industry after his nonprofit and later campaign received massive donations from heads of the oil and gas sectors.

TITLE: Secret Service returns $286 million in fraudulent pandemic loans to the Small Business Administration
SUMMARY: The Economic Injury Disaster loans returned to the Small Business Administration were obtained using fabricated information and stolen identities.

TITLE: Read the redacted document justifying the Trump Mar-a-Lago raid
SUMMARY: The 38-page affidavit lays out the FBI's probable cause to search Trump's home.

TITLE: DOJ reveals redacted affidavit justifying Trump Mar-a-Lago raid
SUMMARY: The Justice Department revealed a redacted copy of the affidavit used to obtain a search warrant for former President Donald Trump's home Mar-a-Lago.

TITLE: Parts of Trump search warrant affidavit to be unsealed Friday, judge orders
SUMMARY: The FBI raided the Mar-a-Lago home of former President Donald Trump earlier this month as part of a criminal probe of removed White House documents.

TITLE: Biden condemns GOP criticism of student loan debt forgiveness
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden calls out House Republicans who criticized student loan forgiveness.

TITLE: Two people plead guilty in theft of diary of Ashley Biden, daughter of president
SUMMARY: A stolen diary belonging to Ashley Biden, daughter of President Joe Biden, was shopped to the Trump campaign, which passed on buying it, court records say.

TITLE: DOJ files proposal on redactions for Trump search warrant affidavit for Mar-a-Lago raid
SUMMARY: The removal of hundreds of pages of records from the White House by President Donald Trump is being investigated by the Department of Justice.

TITLE: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene 'swatted' for second time in two days, police say
SUMMARY: It was the second "swatting" call in two days targeting Marjorie Taylor Greene, a far-right Republican backed by former President Donald Trump.

TITLE: Montana House seat contender and Trump Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke lied to department watchdog in casino probe, report finds
SUMMARY: Ryan Zinke, who served as Interior Department secretary under then-President Donald Trump, has faced two damning reports by an internal watchdog this year.

TITLE: Biden marks Ukrainian Independence Day with nearly $3 billion in security assistance
SUMMARY: The announcement of the upcoming military aid package, the 19th such installment, comes as Ukraine celebrates 31 years of its independence.
